data.title: Best Hot dogs
data.text: I love the food in that place. It is also nice to have a drink at the evening and chat with your friends.

data.title: Great Food
data.text: Sup Dogs is a great local establishment. Always crowded so expect a wait but the food is well worth the wait.

data.title: Not Happy
data.text: As always enjoy going to here but today was not told systems were down and it was cash only. Had to use ATM which charges a fee. Issue is should have at least been told when seated not after we had eaten. Not happy at all.

data.title: Good food here!
data.text: Very good food. Great dogs with their secret sauce. College atmosphere. Very casual. If your looking to relax and talk with friends this is a great place to go.

data.title: Something for a change
data.text: Who would've thought about opening a sit down restaurant selling hotdogs? They've got a great variety of hot dogs that are really good. I've always had good service when I've been there. Be sure to check out the taco tots.

data.title: Faut
data.text: The food is good and reasonable in price.  Not a huge family admosphere as its more designed for college life.  Good beer specials and they offer a nice outdoor seating area.however there are no gluten free options.

data.title: Best hotdogs ever!
data.text: Went there after leaving our daughter at ECU for an overnight orientation. Wanted a quick easy meal - heard the hype but a hot dog is just a hot dog, right? Wrong :)....not when it's topped with the cheese & bacon or sour cream & lettuce....we had 4 types and they were all delicious! Oh....and don't skip their signature frozen drinks!

data.title: Love love love!
data.text: Diverse clientele when we went for lunch so don't expect to see all college kids- everyone has picked up on this hidden little gem. I had a specialty hot dog, my husband had a specialty burger, daughter had the pep pizza cheese fries and son had chicken tenders. Everyone loved their meals!!We sat on the veranda and had an outstanding meal. We will be back!!!

data.title: Cute atmosphere
data.text: Cute atmosphere.  Kid friendly.  The house bbq/ranch sauce was so tasty that we dipped our fries in it like ketchup.  My girlfriend even purchased a bottle to take home for $5.  Would defiantly recommend.

data.title: Bad in All the Right Ways!
data.text:
Due to their amazing popularity and limited space, I have only eaten there once. The food was amazing. I mean if you are a person who feels guilty about ingesting food that is bad for you, you might want to stay away. Likewise, if you are a person who is almost bedridden because you cannot stop eating, you might want to avoid it as well. All those in between will find it almost sinfully good. The service was also top notch. 

The only downside of the place is the limitation in space. Otherwise, there is nowhere else I would prefer to go if I am looking for a decadent, fast meal. I would need to go to the gym beforehand . . and maybe afterward too though. :)

data.title: Can't miss place in Greenville
data.text: Great hot dogs, burgers and beverages! This is an absolute must if you are in Greenville. It is primarily a "college" place, so if you are too boring for a sometimes loud but always fun atmosphere, go elsewhere. The waitresses are great and your dog is welcome too.

data.title: I LOVE IT
data.text: I eat here alot and for good reason.. The food is always exceptional... the staff are always there to greet you with a smile... if you have been to greenville and not been here then let me know when you actually want to see greenville.. the environment is always nice.. absolutely love this place.. the staff go out of their way to make it suit you.. its the type of environment money cannot buy... anyone that gives this place a bad review probably hasnt ate here... i get my haircut in durham.. if have to say that it makes me want to take an extra couple miles to see the sup dogs in chapel hill...would suggest this to anyone regardless of age

data.title: A Greenville right of passage.
data.text: If you have visited Greenville and did not have a beer or food at this place then you did not truly visit Greenville. Food is cheap, and beer is cheap. Servers are fun and quick for the most part. Don't go on a Monday night. Two words. Mug Night. It can be really packed because the place is smaller than my 500 square foot apartment but you really do get the college party experience when you go here. Thanks for all the blurry memories Sup Dogs! Also parents, please don't bring your kids. This is not a family friendly place. It is for college kids and people who still wanna be college kids.

data.title: Great place
data.text: Very casual,   good food,   drinks are great price.  Very crowded,  has a great outdoor seating.    Great place for college kids and this mom visiting her son.   good selection and not just hotdogs,   fried pickles are awesome!

data.title: Best hotdog ever!
data.text: I love visiting here. I got with friends or family at least a few times a month. It's in the perfect location near downtown and has a great atmosphere! I love the cheesy bacon delight combo and my friends like the bacon cheese fry burger.

data.title: Dog friendly
data.text: The dog friendly deck took us there but the excellent service and good food will take us back.  Patrons and staff all welcomed my lab with pats and kisses. If you are looking for causal food, cold beer and a relaxing environment here it is!!!

data.title: Visiting Daughter at ECU
data.text: The BEST hot dogs I've ever had! Every kind imaginable and love the shoestring fries. Servers are very good. Great atmosphere also.

data.title: Prices went up but quality didn't
data.text: Every few months we stop by - like that the dog can join us on the deck in nice weather. They used to brag that all meals were under $5 ($4.99) but now the meals are $7.49 and still the same burgers and dogs in a basket.

data.title: Love supdogs!
data.text: Love love love!!! And now you can take home there sauce! Will go there whenever I'm in town and am able! Great food great service and love the new deck roof!

data.title: Best Hot Dogs in NC is True
data.text: This is a great local hangout spot in Greenville. The crowd can get a little rowdy at times after 5 on Monday and Thurs - Sat but what would you expect in a college town that loves to party. The hot dogs and burgers are not only top both in Grenville but also NC. Have a Supcrush to compliment your hotdog and your meal will be complete.
